      • signal

        protected abstract java.util.concurrent.Future<com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.Boolean>> signal(java.lang.String key,
                                                                                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> param,
                                                                                                          int deferredCount,
                                                                                                          java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool fjp)
        wait for firing event.
        パラメータ:
        key - identification for the session
        param - waiting configuration
        deferredCount - the times this task continued
        fjp - executor service
        戻り値:
        advance for the event process task -> true continue this waiting task -> false stop the event loop -> absent
